hero.titulo: AMODES - Mozambican Association for Sustainable Development
hero.subtitulo: Working together to build a better future through social initiatives and community development.

servicos.titulo: Highlights of what the association does

impactoSocial.descricao: More than 1000 families benefited through our social programs and community initiatives.

educacao.descricao: Educational programs that have already benefited more than 500 young people and adults in vulnerable situations.

desenvolvimento.descricao: Projects that strengthen community ties and promote sustainable local development.

areasAtuacao.descricao: Learn about the main areas where we work to promote social development and improve the quality of life in communities.

itens: School reinforcement for children and adolescents
Promotion of local culture and traditions
Digital inclusion and access to information
Physical activities and promotion of healthy lifestyles
Promotion of racial and gender equality
Defense of the rights of children, elderly and people with disabilities
Access to justice and legal information
Incubation of social and sustainable businesses

projetos.descricao: Learn about some of our projects and initiatives that have transformed communities and improved the quality of life for thousands of people.

galeria.descricao: See images of our events, projects and activities that demonstrate our impact on communities.
galeria.nenhumaImagem: No images found for this category.

historia.descricao1: AMODES was founded in 2010 with the aim of promoting social and economic development in the most vulnerable communities. Our journey began with small local initiatives and today we impact thousands of people through our programs.
historia.descricao2: We work in partnership with governmental and non-governmental organizations to implement sustainable projects that meet the specific needs of each community, always respecting their culture and values.

missao.descricao: To promote equality, social justice and sustainable development in Mozambique with a special focus on defending the human rights of children, youth, women, the elderly and people with disabilities, and promoting the equitable participation of these groups in decision-making processes.

visao.descricao: To be a national reference as an association that promotes justice, dignity, empowerment and sustainable actions towards development.

equipe.descricao: Meet the dedicated professionals who work daily to make a difference in communities.
equipe.membroDefault: Dedicated AMODES team member, working to make a difference in the community.

contato.descricao: Have a question or suggestion? Contact us and we'll be happy to help.
